title: Artist Profile: Jagoda Wisniewska
body:
Jagoda’s photographic series ‘Cherry Compote’ seeks to explore and document the reality preserved and presented when capturing the ‘non-events’ of daily life.

The things that aren’t normally preserved.

“An exploration of photography’s implicit relationship to realism.“

With their own rich colour pallet, these images show the reality of Jagoda’s grandparents Sylvester and Nina. The reality, she puts it, “they are bound to”.

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/JAGODA-WISNIEWSKA-2-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/24377-artist-profile-jagoda-wisniewska/attachment/jagoda-wisniewska-2)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/JAGODA-WISNIEWSKA-3-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/24377-artist-profile-jagoda-wisniewska/attachment/jagoda-wisniewska-3)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/JAGODA-WISNIEWSKA-4-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/24377-artist-profile-jagoda-wisniewska/attachment/jagoda-wisniewska-4)

  

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/JAGODA-WISNIEWSKA-5-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/24377-artist-profile-jagoda-wisniewska/attachment/jagoda-wisniewska-5)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/JAGODA-WISNIEWSKA-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/24377-artist-profile-jagoda-wisniewska/attachment/jagoda-wisniewska)

  

The colours and textures of these mundane moments are honed in on and framed to beautiful effects.

See more of Jagoda’s work [here](http://www.photojago.com/).
